message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $12000 to you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at an exclusive price of $10500. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
